Access server: $link = mysql_connect(host, user, password); or $db = new mysqli(host, user, password); or $db = new PDO('mysql:host=hostname;dbname=dbname', 'username', 'password');
Use database: mysql_select_db(''name'', $link); or $db = new mysqli(host, user, password, ''name''); or $db->select_db(''name'');

Access server: db = MySQLdb.connect(  host="hostname", user="username", passwd="password", db="dbname", connect_timeout=5)
